definition: rather destroy ten temples than a single marriage (idiom)
pinyin: ning2 chai1 shi2 zuo4 miao4 , bu4 hui4 yi1 zhuang1 hun1
simplified: 宁拆十座庙，不毁一桩婚
word: 寧拆十座廟，不毀一樁婚

definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
